title: Beautiful apartment ready for YOU!
posting_body: Comfortable Las Vegas Living in a Classic Setting
Picturesque red rock formations and clear blue skies welcome you to Las Vegas, NV, as the neon lights of the iconic Strip glow in the background.

Enjoy the best of both worlds when you live at The Boulevard, a newly renovated apartment community with an ideal location moments away from all the world-class casinos, shopping, dining and outdoor attractions that the town has to offer.
Come home to superior design, comfort and style in an inviting garden-style setting.
Your new apartment features wood laminate flooring, a washer and dryer set, a private patio or balcony.
Your beautiful kitchen comes complete with stainless or black appliance package, new cabinets with brushed nickel hardware, glass subway tile back splash and resurfaced granite-like counter tops.
You also gain access to impressive amenities, including a refreshing pool, a fitness center and more.
Inquire about the available residences in this southeast Las Vegas community when you call today.
Use this link for more information:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 650 Sq.
- Stainless or Black Appliance Package with Microwave
- New Cabinet Fronts with Brushed Nickel Hardware
- New, Modern Interior Paint, Lighting, and Fixtures
- Glass Subway Tile Kitchen Back splash
- All Apartments Pre-wired for High Speed Internet and Cable
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $350 non-refundable pet fee, per pet.
Pet rent is $25 per pet per month.
The weight limit is 75 lbs per pet and aggressive breeds are prohibited.
Please contact our leasing office for more information about our pet policy.
3050 S. Nellis Blvd, Las Vegas, NV, 89121
